title: create a version for each public api class
body:
with the new public api classes (see #4863), we could introduce versions for each class in the public api.

the version consists of a major and a minor version, which is independent of the owncloud version number. the major version is increased if there are incompatible changes in the api (removed classes, changed behaviour of methods, ...), the minor version is increased when new functions are added to the public api.

apps could have the dependencies in the info.xml like this:
```
<?xml version="1.1"?>
<info>
  ...
  <requirements>
    <api name="app">1.0</api>
    <api name="db">2.5</api>
  </requirements>
</info>
```

this app would work with any owncloud installation that has the class ocp\app in the version 1.0<=x<2.0 and the class ocp\db in version 2.5<=x<3.0

other aspects of owncloud like the js api could be added to the requirements, too.

what do you think about this idea?
